required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on May 29, 2018
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: Study to Describe the Management and the Use of Healthcare Resources in Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) Initiating Venetoclax in Routine Clinical Practice
clinical_study.official_title: Post-Marketing Observational Study (PMOS) to Describe the Management and the Use of Healthcare Resources in Patients With Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) Initiating Venetoclax in Routine Clinical Practice (DEVOTE)

brief_summary.textblock: A study to assess the real-life management and use of healthcare resources during the initiation of venetoclax in participants with chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL) with the deletion of the short arm of chromosome 17 (del[17p]) who have received at least 1 prior therapy or participants with CLL without del(17p) who have received at least 1 prior therapy and for whom there are no other available treatment options.

primary_outcome.description: Duration of prophylactic hospitalization is defined as the date of discharge - the date of admission + 1.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Hours from Dosing to Blood Draw
primary_outcome.description: Number of hours between laboratory assessments and the first dose of each ramp-up dose for venetoclax

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Hours on Intravenous (IV) fluid hydration
primary_outcome.description: Number of hours a participant was on IV fluid hydration.

primary_outcome.measure: Percent of Participants with Tumor Burden of Low, Medium, and High
primary_outcome.description: Percent of participants with tumor burden of low, medium, and high.

primary_outcome.measure: Other Actions Taken within the First 24 Hours of each Dose Ramp-up
primary_outcome.description: Other actions taken within the first 24 hours of each dose ramp-up, for example, prophylaxis treatment

primary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Health Care Resource Utilization (HCRU)
primary_outcome.description: HCRU will be evaluated using self-administered questionnaire aimed at measuring the patient's health care resource utilization.
Change in metabolites (potassium, creatinine, uric acid, phosphorus, calcium) post dose.

primary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Prophylactic Hospitalization
primary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with prophylactic hospitalization is defined as the percentage of participants who are hospitalized for prophylactic measures.
Change in creatinine clearance is defined as the change of creatinine clearance from Baseline (Day 0).

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Hours for Dose Interruptions
primary_outcome.description: Number of hours for dose interruptions is defined as the duration of dose interruptions in hours. If more than one does interruption occurs, the total number of hours for dose interruption will be calculated.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Weeks for Ramping up Venetoclax Dose to 400 mg daily (QD)
primary_outcome.description: Number of weeks for ramping up to Venetoclax 400 mg QD as the duration of the ramping-up period in weeks.

primary_outcome.measure: Number of Days on Each Dose of Venetoclax
primary_outcome.description: Number of days on each dose of venetoclax is defined as the date of first exposure to the dose - the date of the last exposure to the dose + 1.

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Other Mutations
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with other mutations.
Duration of time from most recent CLL relapse and Baseline (Day 0).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Major Co-Morbidities
secondary_outcome.description: Percentage of participants with major co-morbidities including medical history/surgery and transplant prior to Baseline (Day 0).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percentage of Participants with Exposure to Ibrutinib and/or Idelalisib Prior to Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Participants with previous exposure to ibrutinib and/or idelalisib prior to Baseline (Day 0).

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in EORTC QLQ-C30 Scores
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in the European Organization for Research and Treatment of Cancer Quality of Life Questionnaire (EORTC QLQ-C30) scores.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group Performance Status
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Eastern Cooperative Oncology Group (ECOG) performance status.

secondary_outcome.measure: Change from Baseline in QLQ-CLL17 Scores
secondary_outcome.description: Change from baseline in Quality of Life Questionnaire - Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (QLQ-CLL)17 scores.

secondary_outcome.measure: Weeks Since Initiating First Line of Therapy for CLL
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of time in weeks from date of first line of therapy administered for CLL to Baseline (Day 0).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent of Participants at Each Stage in the Rai Staging System
secondary_outcome.description: Percent of participants at each stage in the Rai Staging System for CLL.
Percentage of participants with the deletion of the short arm of chromosome 17 (Del[17p]).

secondary_outcome.measure: Percent of Participants at Each Stage in the Binet Staging System
secondary_outcome.description: Percent of participants at each stage in the Binet Staging System for CLL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Number of Prior Lines of Therapy for CLL
secondary_outcome.description: Number of prior lines of therapy for CLL before initiating administration with venetoclax.

secondary_outcome.measure: Years to Treatment from Initial Diagnosis of Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL)
secondary_outcome.description: Years to treatment with venetoclax (Baseline, Day 0) from initial diagnosis of CLL.

secondary_outcome.measure: Weeks since the Last Line of Therapy (Agent) for CLL Prior to Baseline
secondary_outcome.description: Duration of time in weeks since line of therapy (agent) administered for CLL prior to Baseline (Day 0).
Duration of time in weeks from diagnosis of CLL to first relapse.

arm_group.description: Participants with Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) receiving venetoclax.

study_pop.textblock: Participants with Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia (CLL) who have received at least one prior therapy or participants with CLL without del(17p) who have received at least one prior therapy and for whom there are no other available treatment options

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Patient's physician prescribed venetoclax as per product monograph independent of the patient participation in this study.
- Has chronic lymphocytic leukemia (CLL) with deletion of the short arm of chromosome (17del[17p]) who have received at least 1 prior therapy, or CLL without del(17p) who have received at least one prior therapy and for whom there are no other available treatment options.
Exclusion Criteria:
- Currently participating in an interventional study.
- Using strong CYP3A inhibitors.
- Has other condition that, in the opinion of the treating physician, prohibits the patient from participating in the study or obscures the assessment of the treatment of CLL.
- Is pregnant or not using appropriate means of contraception.

facility.name: Cisss Du Bas-Saint-Laurent Hopital Regional de Rimouski

clinical_study.keyword: Deletion of the short arm of chromosome 17 (Del[17p])
Chronic Lymphocytic Leukemia with deletion of the short arm of chromosome 17
